TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionOptions extends System.Management.ManagementOptions

summary.span: 指定生成 WMI 连接所需的所有设置。

span.span: Specifies all settings required to make a WMI connection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机使用默认连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with default connection options. remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/cs/ConnectionOptions-9.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions-9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions-9/vb/ConnectionOptions-9.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::AuthenticationLevel Authentication { System::Management::AuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::AuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于此连接中的操作的 COM 身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 返回 枚举值，该值指示连接到本地或远程计算机时使用的 COM 身份验证级别。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the COM authentication level used for a connection to the local or a remote computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 2000 和更低，WMI 服务将请求连接级别的身份验证，在 Windows XP 和更高版本，它会请求数据包级别的身份验证。On Windows 2000 and below, the WMI service will request Connect level authentication, while on Windows XP and higher it will request Packet level authentication. 如果客户端需要特定身份验证设置，此属性可以用于控制此特定连接上的身份验证级别。If the client requires a specific authentication setting, this property can be used to control the authentication level on this particular connection. 例如，属性可以设置为如果客户端要求所有的通信进行加密。For example, the property can be set to if the client requires all communication to be encrypted. ## 属性值Property Value 要用于此连接中的操作将 COM 身份验证级别。The COM authentication level to be used for operations in this connection. 默认值是，根据标准的 DCOM 协商过程指示客户端将使用服务器，请求的身份验证级别。The default value is , which indicates that the client will use the authentication level requested by the server, according to the standard DCOM negotiation process. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authentication/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于验证指定用户的授权。

span.span: Gets or sets the authority to be used to authenticate the specified user.

value.span: 返回 ，它定义了用于对指定用户进行身份验证的授权。

span.span: Returns a that defines the authority used to authenticate the specified user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须传递属性，如下所示： 如果替换的字符串以"Kerberos:"，将使用 Kerberos 身份验证，并且此属性应包含 Kerberos 主体名称。The property must be passed as follows: If it begins with the string "Kerberos:", Kerberos authentication will be used and this property should contain a Kerberos principal name. 例如，应用于对象的For example, ``` Kerberos: ``` 如果字符串开头的属性值"NTLMDOMAIN:"，将使用 NTLM 身份验证，并且该属性应包含的 NTLM 域名。If the property value begins with the string "NTLMDOMAIN:", NTLM authentication will be used and the property should contain a NTLM domain name. 例如，应用于对象的For example, ``` NTLMDOMAIN: ``` 如果该属性为 null，将使用 NTLM 身份验证，并将使用当前用户的 NTLM 该域。If the property is null, NTLM authentication will be used and the NTLM domain of the current user will be used. ## 属性值Property Value 如果不是`null`，此属性可包含在其中获取用户进行身份验证的 Windows NT/Windows 2000 域的名称。If not `null`, this property can contain the name of the Windows NT/Windows 2000 domain in which to obtain the user to authenticate. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/cs/ConnectionOptions_Authority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Authority/vb/ConnectionOptions_Authority.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnablePrivileges { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否需要为连接操作启用用户特权。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

summary.span: 只有在执行的操作需要启用某种用户特权（例如，重新启动计算机）时，才应使用此属性。

span.span: This property should only be used when the operation performed requires a certain user privilege to be enabled (for example, a machine restart).

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示是否需要为连接操作启用用户特权。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果需要为该连接操作; 启用用户特权否则为`false`。`true` if user privileges need to be enabled for the connection operation; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Management::ImpersonationLevel Impersonation { System::Management::ImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Management::ImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于此连接中的操作的 COM 模拟级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection.

value.span: 返回 枚举值，该值指示用于连接到 WMI 的模拟级别。

span.span: Returns an enumeration value indicating the impersonation level used to connect to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序不受信任的应用程序或服务时，设置将非常有利。The setting is advantageous when the provider is a trusted application or service. 它不需要提供商联系，以执行客户端标识和访问检查请求的操作。It eliminates the need for the provider to perform client identity and access checks for the requested operations. 但是，如果出于某种原因不能为受信任的提供程序，使其能够模拟客户端可能构成安全威胁。However, if for some reason the provider cannot be trusted, allowing it to impersonate the client may constitute a security threat. 在这种情况下，我们建议，此属性设置为较低的值，客户端如。In such cases, we recommend that this property be set by the client to a lower value, such as . 请注意，这可能导致提供程序未能执行请求的操作，缺少足够的权限，或者无法执行访问检查，导致。Note that this may cause failure of the provider to perform the requested operations, for lack of sufficient permissions or inability to perform access checks. ## 属性值Property Value 要用于此连接中的操作的 COM 模拟级别。The COM impersonation level to be used for operations in this connection. 默认值是，指示在此连接中执行请求的操作时，WMI 提供程序可以模拟客户端。The default value is , which indicates that the WMI provider can impersonate the client when performing the requested operations in this connection. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/cs/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Impersonation/vb/ConnectionOptions_Impersonation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Locale { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于连接操作的区域设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the locale to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用于连接到 WMI 时使用的区域设置。

span.span: Returns a value used for the locale in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 Microsoft 区域设置标识符，字符串的格式是"MS_*xxx*"，其中*xxx*以十六进制形式，该值指示区域设置标识符 (LCID); 例如，美国英语将是一个字符串显示为"MS_409"。For Microsoft locale identifiers, the format of the string is "MS_*xxx*", where *xxx* is a string in hexadecimal form that indicates the Locale Identification (LCID); for example, American English would appear as "MS_409". ## 属性值Property Value 默认值为 DEFAULTLOCALE。The default value is DEFAULTLOCALE. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/cs/ConnectionOptions_Locale.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_Locale/vb/ConnectionOptions_Locale.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Password { void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用于连接到 WMI 时使用的密码。

span.span: Returns a value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 空字符串 ("") 指定的有效长度为零的密码。A blank string ("") specifies a valid zero-length password. 将密码进行硬编码是一个安全威胁。Hard-coding a password is a security threat. 使用如加密密码，或在设置时提示用户输入密码的安全防范措施属性。Use security precautions such as encrypting a password, or prompting the user for a password when you set the property. ## 属性值Property Value 默认值为 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果用户名称也是`null`，使用的凭据将是当前登录的用户。If the user name is also `null`, the credentials used will be those of the currently logged-on user. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::SecureString ^ SecurePassword { void set(System::Security::SecureString ^ value); };

span.span: Sets the password for the specified user.

value.span: 返回用于连接到 WMI 所使用密码的 SecureString 值。

span.span: Returns a SecureString value used for the password in a connection to WMI.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Username { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将用于连接操作的用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets the user name to be used for the connection operation.

value.span: 返回 值，该值用作连接到 WMI 时使用的用户名。

span.span: Returns a value used as the user name in a connection to WMI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户名称是从当前域之外的域中，字符串可能包含的域名和用户名，由反斜杠分隔： 字符串 username ="EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere"。If the user name is from a domain other than the current domain, the string may contain the domain name and user name, separated by a backslash: string 'username' = "EnterDomainHere\\\EnterUsernameHere". `strUser`参数不能为空字符串。The `strUser` parameter cannot be an empty string. ## 属性值Property Value `null` 如果连接将使用当前登录的用户;否则为表示用户名称的字符串。`null` if the connection will use the currently logged-on user; otherwise, a string representing the user name. 默认值为 `null`。The default value is `null`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例连接到远程计算机，并在远程计算机上显示有关操作系统的信息。The following example connects to a remote computer and displays information about the operating system on the remote computer. A将创建连接到远程计算机的所需的连接选项。A is created to connect to the remote computer with the desired connection options. [!code-csharp[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/cs/ConnectionOptions_Username.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ConnectionOptions_UserName/vb/ConnectionOptions_Username.vb#1)]
